name: fullstack-hy2020-backend
description: Backend part of Full Stack Open Course 2020 at University of Helsinki

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fullstack-hy2020/part2/phonebook && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../fullstack-hy2020-backend/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy

author: Cheng Hu
